page.title: 02Employment and Housing
page.content: There are 4 main areas of employment. Aviation, shoes, building and agri- culture. Most people work away from the village. Because of poor and infrequent public transport, many families run two cars. A high pro- portion of wives have to work to augment the income. This is mainly part time employment. Half the housing is over 100 years old, half under 10. Blue lias and reconstitued stone are the main materials. Thatching has often been replaced by Roman pantiles. The population is about 950. All the properties, mainly detached, have garden space, and pets are popular, and include racing pigeons, ferrets and sheep.
